column2: Text
The Emperor is defeated!
Rout the forces of the Empire Bounty Hunters.
The High Elves rally in defence of the Great Vortex, take their lives!
Defend yourselves for (minutes)
Click the Skills button to open the Character Details panel.
Defend against the ambush until your reinforcements are here.
Drive the Dwarfs off these mountains!
Destroy the entire Chaos Warhost!
The enemy has crossed the river further to the right and outflanked our position!
The blood soaking the battlefield has lured the Ancient from his crypt. It is time to destroy his forces and use his essence for the ritual!
More minions of the Daemon assault our rear!
The High Elves make their way onto the Isle! Defeat them!
The witch has summoned reinforcements!
The Liche King himself joins the battle. Defeat him before he can summon Nagash to Nehekhara once more!
The green things flee before us. Chase them down and destroy them!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Ascend to the Fallen Gate and kill or rout the [[col:magic]]Elven Mages[[/col]].
Defeat the High Elves
Slaughter the stunty gits!
Kill the Chaos forces and claim their shiny fings!
Close the Character Details panel to continue.
A force led by a Vampire Lord approaches! Defeat it!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Kill or rout the enemy Lord, yes-yes!
Kolt Ludenhof has arrived with reinforcements. The tide has turned in your favour - deal the killing blow to these Norscan scum!
Defeat the High Elf defence
Yet more of the enemy emerge from their ships!
The Bretonnians have been caught off guard! Advance on the their peasants and reap a bloody harvest!
More Southerners come; these ones have had time to arm themselves for war.
The clamour of battle has drawn poachers from the nearby forest, watch out for their arrow fire!
Survey your army and choose a formation, then advance to the bridge.
Finally! The Green Knight shows himself - slay him in the name of the Dark Gods!
The Knights of Bretonnia come to face us!
Upgrade your main settlement building.
A force led by a Vampire Lord approaches! Defeat it!
We must defeat these forces and lure out the guardian to slay it!
Yet more Chaos Warriors come, intending to defend the monolith from attack.
Defeat the Dark Elves
Survey your army and deploy your forces to hold the river crossings.
Defeat the Undead and claim the tomb!
Attack the enemy army.
Destroy the enemy reinforcements!
They clearly fear us, they have brought reinforcements with them.
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Survive both the Skaven and the Great Bat!
What fools! To come into our lands. Let us show then that the night is full of darkness and shadows!
The Mortuary Cult has raised a deadly swarm of locusts to aid your cause.
Skavenslaves are flanking us!
More Skaven have joined the fray from the rear!
Morghur's protective aura is weakened for
The Greenskins are swarming your Dwarfen brothers. Join the battle and bring the Dawi the victory that is their right!
Gut the sneaky bastard and 'is army! That'll teach him to mess with my Squiggly Beast!
Attack the enemy.
A Challenger Comes! To destroy, to conquer, to annihilate. Prepare yourself!
Open the Technologies panel.
Start researching a technology.
In a final push, the Witch-king himself has joined the battle. Hold firm and repel him!
Move the camera to inspect the points of interest
The Lord of the Solar-City sends more reinforcements.
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the Reptile-things defending the island, yes-yes!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]] Defend the river crossing!
Put those bones back in their tombs!
The War Hydra brings a mania upon all - everyone in the battlefield will be enraged!
With every lumbering step, frenzied vermin burst from the Hellbeast's abdomen!
More horrid little stunties enter the battle - the gitz!
Those bearded gitz, the Dwarfs, are attacking from a different direction - curse 'em! Kill 'em!
Beastmen are emerging from all directions! Chaos is rife!
Rally the warriors, Greenskins sighted atop the hill!
More Greenskins!
End the Turn
We have tarried here too long! Undead reinforcements approach from the marshes!
Greenskins attack from the flank!
More Greenskin raiders are pouring from the passes!
The Dark Elves make their way onto the Isle! Defeat them!
Move the camera to inspect the points of interest
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defend the Gate from the forces of Chaos!
The enemy Lord is defeated! Their army shall soon follow!
A group of Glade Guards is being overwhelmed by Strigoi Ghoul Kings!
Kemmler's apprentice controls the Undead horde. Slay him and his dark servants!
Defeat the Greenskin robbers and claim the Gromril for yourself!
The Undead flying gits approach from both sides!
The champion of this frenzied herd of beasts is a blood-hungry Gorebull. Kill him before he tears us apart!
These men know not what they protect. Slaughtering them will spill enough blood to draw forth the Ancient...
Survey your army and choose a formation, then begin the hunt!
Defend yourself against the enemy army!
Beware, the Strigoi Ghoul King has been granted special powers by Nagash, through which he may resurrect his minions indefinitely.
Select your Hero.
Select your army.
Your ally cannot hold much longer.
For the Slayer King! Wipe out the Undead.
Kill the Bray-Shaman, his influence over the herd cannot be over-stated!
Select all your units
The Beastmen are products of the Chaos Lord's dark rituals. They are no ordinary Gors - beware!
The Empire is deploying artillery on the hill!
There is the Ar-Ulric's champion - slay him in Sigmar's name and the Reiksguard will join the fray to ensure the Staff of Command is returned to its rightful owner!
The Empire commanders are in disarray! Their army is fallin' apart! Good!
[[img:ui/skins/default/panel_title_attacker.png]] Wipe out the secessionists
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the Lizardmen looters!
Warmbloods seek to slow us down? Ignore them, charge forward!
The Grey Seer Clan send one final attack! Defend the Vortex at all costs!
More Elven guardians come to protect their beloved Phoenix.
Lizardman join the battle - they will die with their beloved pet!
Those Shamans hide on the hill. We must wipe them out, but also be careful of the forces approaching from our flanks!
Claim the Chaos Tomb Blade!
Their scattered units are reforming and joining the main host!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Survive the Dead-thing zombie onslaught, yes-yes!
The cowards have brought more artillery to bear!
Slay the legendary beast!
The Greenskins act like trapped rats! They have nothing left to lose - beware their vicious attacks!
Survey your army and choose a formation, then advance quickly!
Clanrats says more Beard-things scurry closer. Arrive soon, yes-yes?
Those Empire gitz are gathering for a scrap - kill their commanders to stop 'em reinforcing!
Defend yourself against the enemy reinforcements!
Remove the curse from the Helm of the Kraken by slaying the Grey Seer!
Pesky dead Man-things won't stay dead!
The Glade Guards are over-run! Now, only your own force can stop the Undead onslaught!
Survey your army and choose a formation, then advance.
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the assembled horde of Chaos Warriors!
Start the battle.
Enemy reinforcements arrive from within the jungle!
Defend Black Fire Pass!
The Goblins have placed artillery on the cliffs ahead of us. They must be stopped - preferably by killing the entire force of evil, green scum!
Azhag the Slaughterer advances on us! Destroy his Orcish forces!
Wurrzag's Savage Orcs are closing in on us! Truly, this onslaught knows no end!
The Knights Errant have returned to our aid! Our foes will feel the earth shake from their charge!
The threat is very real and not over yet. Grimgor Ironhide comes to challenge us, with his mightiest Orcs in tow. Slay him and end this menace to mankind!
Attack and defeat the enemy army!
The mercenaries, realising their error, flee before the Undead hordes.
The armour is mine-mine! The rest of you vermin scurry-away!
Beware, a tankity-tank approaches!
More gits approach from the south.
The mounted Greenskins have returned, their allies are sure to follow!
Praise Sigmar! The doughty Dwarfs have come to aid us!
Yes, my pretties! The Chaos tribe flees! Strike them down swiftly as they run...
Kill or rout all the Greenskin Shamans.
This Glade Lord failed to resist the lure of the Ruinous Powers. Slay her and her corrupted retinue!
Defeat the Tomb King alliance!
Kruti! The manlings are waylaid! Shields!
This is the last hope of men. Shatter them once and for all: slay their Emperor - kill their king!
Defeat the Grey Seer Clan
You now control the Great Vortex, use the abilities bestowed upon you!
Survey your army and choose a formation, then advance.
Order your Lord to move to the army.
Hurry your forces into battle.
Order your forces to advance.
Rout the enemy defenders to obtain a powerful magic ability. Be mindful of enemy reinforcements!
With its last head taken, the monster is finally dead!
The monster has finally fallen!
Select Grimgor's army.
Advance Grimgor's army towards the plain.
Defeat the enemy and prevent them from completing their final ritual!
Slay the Strigoi Ghoul King to prevent his servants from being resurrected.
Destroy the Norscan raiders and claim victory in Manann's name.
Prepare for the performance of a lifetime, before the Asur royal family no less!
Engage the unfortunate Greenskins before their mounted scouts return with Skaven allies!
Help your allies to defeat Arkhan's minions.
Fend off the Chaos invaders so we can repair the Axe of Dargo!
Defeat the Lord of Change!
Select Karaz-a-Karak.
Upgrade the Sparring Chamber into a Barracks.
Defeat the enemy at the Vortex!
The violence attracts more Undead lurking near to the battlefield.
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the enemy Dreadlord before the time limit expires.
The enemy Champion is imbued with protection from his master. Avoid attacking him until his protection runs out!
Deploy the rest of your army close to the hill.
The enemy forces are reinforced by monsters capable of flying over the chasm and our defenders.
The Empire are all but defeated, finish them off
Examine the positions of importance
Slaughtered soldiers will rise again, only this time far stronger than before.
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Survive the Skaven invasion!
Let us crush the weak vanguard before the main host can join with them.
The enemy Lord approaches.
Let your axes sing with the unclean blood of Chaos minions.
Face your final challenge!
Beware, monstrous foes attack from the rear!
That armour is perfection itself. Only Sigvald is worthy of wearing it!
The Elven Mages have left the Fallen Gate and are vulnerable to attack.
The main army advances - kill them all!
The echoes of our march has attracted some Trolls!
The Mage Queen sends forth her champions to slay you. Ha! It is they who shall be slayed!
Up dere! Their whirly-gig reinforcements have arrived!
Select Thorgrim's army.
Advance Thorgrim's army against the Bloody Spearz.
The stunties are beaten, run them down!
A mighty Sun Dragon has emerged from the Fallen Gate! Use missile or magical units to bring it down.
Select Grimgor's army.
Teclis is skulking about somewhere. Crush this weak Lordling's army before he chooses to show himself!
Ha! I hope they're ready for a knock-out performance!
The defenders will soon be overrun without our assistance.
Morghur and his spawn advance on the Oak of Ages! Protect it at all costs.
You hear battle cries from behind; Fellheart has blocked your escape route. Prepare for his attack!
[[img:ui/skins/default/panel_title_attacker.png]] Eliminate the Druchii forces blocking your way.
Select Black Crag.
Upgrade the Musta Fieldz into a Brawlin' Groundz.
The fools fight one another. Shall we let them kill one another or join in? If they see us the Empire will surely flee!
Select Thorgrim's army.
The Loremasters join battle against us. Teach them a lesson!
More treacherous Loremasters look to throw their lives away today...
The main horde has arrived, kill them all!
From the trees! Spider Riders!
Grind the Undead into dust!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the looting Rogue armies!
Charge the mounted reinforcements into battle.
Charge the enemy rear.
Charge the Rat Ogres into battle.
Kill the Hydra and its bestial keepers!
Kill this hellish Skaven creation!
The Dark Elves have a strong defensive position on the hill. Tread carefully, and leave no Druchii standing.
That cur has brought sellswords to attack us from the woods! Defend yourself!
Beware, Grand Theogonist! The Undead filth have summoned reinforcements!
[DONT TRANSLATE] Defeat the enemy general
Morghur's protective aura is weakened again. Attack him now!
Morghur's aura is at full strength again. Wait for your chance...
More Corpse-things behind us? Hurry, find my book-book!
The Hydra is a voracious beast that can heal friendly units.
The elite Stormvermin – bred in the Hell Pit and unleashed to cause mayhem on the battlefield!
The Hydra can send everything on the battlefield into frenzied rampage.
Kill the Hellbeast of Seep-Gore now, before it overwhelms you!
So the Lordling Teclis has arrived? Destroy his army too!
Kill the Krakenlord!
Select Altdorf.
Select Castle Drakenhof.
Upgrade the Training Field to a Rally Field.
Upgrade the Cemetery into a Barrow.
Select Mannfred's unit to see the available spells.
Ha - this vile Lord is no fool, they come at us from behind on their black steeds. No matter! I will have his head or die trying - either way I fulfil my oath!
Frigustrex can create multiple snow storms. An icy death awaits any who get caught in them!
Traygard is concentrating his power – a lightning storm approaches!
Blorgar is so large that he can even use his own gas as a weapon to blow nearby units away.

column1: Only the strongest of combatants can endure his foul winds!
column2: true
Indeed, the legendary Mammoths are here, but only a single family being hunted by those pesky Dwarfs.

column1: We should protect them and take the calves for ourselves!
column2: true
The Abyssal Shrieker’s weakness is revealed! Each time it summons new minions to protect itself, the monster and anything nearby will suffer damage.

column1: Kill its minions and it will eventually fall, but try to keep your distance!
column2: true
The Phoenix commands the purifying power of fire to heal its guardians when they're severely damaged.
Gargantulzan's primal instinct will make the creature invincible in prolonged combat - disengage when it's on the rampage.
Curtain up! The Bretonnians shall listen and love you once more... or they shall die!
Dis git thinks a mask alone makes him Da Great Green Prophet, for which he deserves to die. Painfully. At once!
Rally the men, Greenskins sighted atop the hill!
More Greenskins! Let us purge the Old World of these brutes!
The enemy sends reinforcements to break through our lines! Hold them off - the Gate must not fall!
They will not get away with this!
Wipe out these Greenskin scum so we can find the location!
Kill these peasants so that we can claim the armour!
We have finally caught the lame beast; slaughter his worthless herd!
The horn of Karak Kadrin! Slayers come seeking their doom - let us oblige them!
Dwarf Rangers have sprung their trap! Act quickly or all could be lost!
The Dwarfs mock you from atop their hill! Kill them all but beware, the Dwarfs may have hidden forces.
Morghur, Malagor the Dark Omen and Khazrak the One-eye have joined forces to corrupt the heart of Athel Loren. Ensure they come no further.
Advance your units.
Select your units.
Go-go Clanrats! Distract the vermin surrounding us while I take my prize! Die for me, yes-yes!
Select Karl Franz's army.
Select von Carstein's army.
Fight Fellheart's vanguard!
More cannons! Stop them firing!
Cannons! Stop them!
Still they continue to flood in like the tide itself!
The Norscans stream forth from the beaches. Push them back to the sea!
The Crow's puppet has his master’s favour! Attacking him is futile, at least for now...
The Soul-Eaters have been slain! What a glorious offering!
Scatter the Beastmen with all haste, Reaper Bolt Throwers advance on both flanks!
Khazrak the One-eye has been spotted on the right flank. Stop him before he can overwhelm our defences!
Your bloodfather charges with a large force - brace yourself and hold your ground!
The monsters are tamed, forcing the Krakenlord himself to fight. Defeat the Corsairs!
The Goblins have you surrounded! Fend off their impending ambush!
Attack the enemy.
Skaven are pouring out of the side caverns. Kill them all!
Lightning storm ends in
Rout the Red Fangs skirmish attack
Move Grimgor Ironhide forwards
Select Grimgor Ironhide
Malagor's brayherd is approaching our positions from the left flank!
Crush the Undead horde back into the ground!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the accursed Skaven army! Kill them!
Kill the enemy Lord to rout their forces!
The Greenskins think they have us cornered. How unlucky for them...
Defend the central plateau and watch for enemy reinforcements!
Select Karl Franz's army.
Select von Carstein's army.
Advance Karl's Franz's army towards Grunburg.
Advance von Carstein's army towards Castle Templehof.
The rest of your army has arrived; combine your forces and advance on the Fallen Gates!
The champion of Anath Raema, the murderer of its own kin, now stands before the great Oak. Slay him at once, and bring justice to the fallen!
The Hound's puppet has his master’s favour! Attacking him is futile, at least for now...
Survey the battlefield.
Survey your army and choose a formation, then advance quickly!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Kill or rout the Elven units on the bridge.
Reinforcements come - look to the jungle for missile or magical support.
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Kill all the attacking Dwarf-things you must, yes-yes!
Select Black Crag.
In the heat of the battle, your enemies fall down without warning. Suddenly, Chaos Spawn bursts forth from the remains of the Elves they used to be!
Morghur's protective aura is weakened. Attack him now!
The Beastlord may be immortal, but bleeds as surely as any other living creature. Keep attacking him when his aura is weakened to ensure our victory!
Now the Corrupter is nothing but shadows, fading away into nothingness. Clear the battlefield and claim your victory!
More Minotaurs have emerged!
Select Karaz-a-Karak.
The blessings of the Mage Queen have reached their peak. If you cut away a single limb, two grow back in its place!
The blessings of the Mage Queen enable the wounded Wood Elves to be healed.
The blessings of the Mage Queen grow stronger!
Zog it! Da enemy 'ave been spotted on the flanks! It's an ambush!
Wipe out the forces of Middenheim for daring to oppose our rule!
Electrical energy surges through the air, something brews in the sky overhead…
Advance and locate the enemy forces.
Select Altdorf.
The currents change - more monsters attack!
The power of the Books of Nagash has caused the dead to rise in support of your cause. Use them well.
More Undead troops have risen – send them to shatter your enemies!
Bretonnian archers have appeared from behind the hill to join your rapturous audience!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the Lizardmen armies.
Todbringer's forces approach the meeting place. Stay calm and strike when the time is right.
Your audience grows! More High Elves have flocked in from behind the hill to ‘enjoy’ your performance!
Enemies have been spotted in the woods! Prepare your flanks - they are sure to charge.
The Frost-Wyrm can summon multiple debilitating snow storms on the battlefield. Try to avoid them!
The Cygors throw scattering rocks which cause widespread damage from afar. Close the distance as fast as possible!
The Dragon Ogre Shaggoths can summon down lightning to the battlefield. Don’t get caught in the storms!
The Brood Queens will release spider hatchlings to defend themselves.
The Giant’s repulsive flatulence scares away any nearby units and knocks them back.
The Ancient Treemen will reinforce their Dragon to greatly increase its resistance to attacks. Kill them quickly to keep the Dragon vulnerable!
Killing the Terrorgheist’s minions may weaken it!
The Phoenix can restore friendly units’ health when it is itself injured.
The longer the Carnosaur stays in combat, the stronger it becomes.
The Frost-Wyrm slows the movement of all units on the map.
Only Lords and Heroes can withstand the Giant’s stench.
When summoning minions, the Terrorgheist and all units around it will lose health.
Ensure no other foe still lives before you tackle the mighty Phoenix.
Make sure you keep your distance when it’s fully provoked.
Settra the Imperishable is here – find a way, he must perish!
Your own crews shall be bolstered - the Krakenlord's forces fight to the last!
A tide of Chaos Spawn has arrived!
Show 'em why Azhag is called "the Slaughterer"!
Let's do dat flankin' move and cut off their reinforcements.
Once again, the Tomb Kings have forged an alliance against necromancy. Defeat them, in Nagash's name!
Ha! The puny humies think they can stop us!
Defeat the Chaos horde before they summon the Shaggoth!
Ambush the enemy and wipe out their forces!
Even more come to be made beautiful… and dead!
More Greenskin vermin approach.
Defeat all opposing armies!
The beardy gits have arrived... More meat for the Grinder!
The venom has taken its toll - Graktar is no more.
Quickly, attack, or they will surely summon the Suneater!
The Norscan raiders have already landed a part of their force. Drive them into the sea before more disembark and unite against us!
A second force of raiders have arrived on the shore. Rally your forces and drive them back!
A third, smaller wave of marauders are preparing their assault. They shall know the power of the Lady when she strikes them down where they stand!
The main Lizardmen force is here, defend the high ground!
A force of Cold One Riders come to support their kin.
Destroy da humie regiment!
Survey your army and choose a formation quickly, then help defend the bridge!
Slay or shatter the Chaos Sorcerer to stop his forces growing.
Lightning storm starts in
The first of Fellheart's crew has been defeated, but more deadly things than Corsairs lurk in the depths.
Further rebel forces have joined the battle.
Defend yourself against the ambushing enemy!
They come, they come! I channel the Winds Of Chamon - I'll have them as bronze statuary before they finish me!
The enemy controls a strong defensive position. Beware of the artillery on the high ground!
The creatures attack!
If we face them at the choke-point we can funnel them into our spears!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Hunt down the Norscan raiders!
Steel yourself, the Beastmen are being goaded in to a headlong charge!
By Grungni! We are ambushed by the foul Greenskins! To me, to me! We make our stand here!
The secessionists approach the meeting site. We should hide to surprise them!
Eliminate Arkhan's minions!
Select Castle Drakenhof.
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the conspiring Prince and his treacherous army.
Slay the legendary beasts!
Survey your army and choose a formation, then quickly advance.
The Dragon Lord approaches, kill him and his warriors will flee!
Morghur's dark aura protects him from all sources of damage. Take on his minions whilst awaiting the opportunity to slay the Beastlord himself!
Survey your army and choose a formation, then advance.
Elven Bolt Throwers have a perfect position to fire on the bridge; take them out!
Dem armoured mugs is in da way of our loot!
Curse them! More Empire soldiers arrive to thwart us!
The ancient ruin is protected by Undead guardians. See them rise in its defence!
Tyrion's forces have regrouped! They advance on the enemy's rear!
The spirits of the forest come to our aid! Together we can defeat the remaining Beastmen.
Start researching a technology.
Open the Technologies panel.
Defend the tomb, it is ours now!
Enter the enemy city.
Take control of your nearby units and enter the city.
Your master speaks to you, his booming voice ringing through your head.

column1: The enemy Lord’s protection has dissipated! Kill him now!
column2: true
Select Yuatek.
Select Naggarond.
Select Hexoatl.
Select Lothern.
To the sound of rumbling thunder, Kholek Suneater has arrived on the field!
The pilgrims have survived the trials of the Chaos Wastes and come to our aid. This is a chance for even the lowliest peasants to prove their courage.
The forces of Chaos, led by Archaon, are ranged against us. The Knights Errant are ready to sweep them away with their mighty charge, but without support their bravery will go to waste!
The daemonic powers of Chaos are unending. Stand firm and may the Lady bless your noble, righteous blades!
Slay the Arch Lector and claim the excavation as your own!
Beastmen are entering the fray to aid the enemy Champion!
Followers from Norsca are entering the fray to aid the enemy Champion!
The foul horde of Chaos is advancing from the shrine!
Destroy the Chaos and Undead Forces defending the city.
More tree-huggers have dared enter the battlefield. They shall meet their deaths this day!
With the Bray-Shaman's death, the dark aura upon your soldiers dies with him. Clear the battlefield and claim your victory!
Your troops are dying merely by looking upon the monster's terrifying countenance!
The power of the Corruptor grows stronger, greatly increasing the damage he is able to inflict.
Touched by Morghur's twisted, evil essence, the Bray-Shaman is damaging your troops.
Survey your army and choose a formation, then advance.
You 'eard 'im! Let's smash up dem stunties!
Orr shall never be Patriarch! We shall wipe him out, utterly.
Recruit some extra units
Open the Recruitment panel.
Open the Recruitment panel.
Recruit some extra units
Survey your army and choose a formation, then advance.
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Wipe out the defenders of Arnheim!
Defeat the Greenskins!
Crush the Dwarfs!
We cannot wait any longer, the men have strayed too far.
Teclis reinforces our flanks! Our victory is assured. Destroy the remaining Druchii!
Good! Good! More meat for the grinder!
The rabble will not let Krell's sword fall into the hands of others. Prepare yourself!
It's a trap!
Purge the Undead!
More Beastmen acolytes enter the fray. Kill them!
Left-click a skill to spend your skill point there.
Our clash has drawn a Terrorgheist from its hiding place!
More Undead arrive, stronger and larger than the last!
The sounds of our battle have stirred the Undead, and Fell Bats swarm at our rear.
The Necromancers inhabiting the city have summoned their forces and emerge from the ruins. We must destroy them!
The Lizardmen bring the rest of their army from the south to flank us. Prepare!
Defeat the Tower's guardians to channel its magic.
The Necromancer summons the rest of his dark legion. Repel their attack and victory will be yours!
Morghur's protective aura will be weakened in
The manlings finally arrive. Better late than never!
The main Vampire force has come to challenge the crossing. Destroy them!
Traitors! Come, fight for me! Kill the reptiles!
It seems the Undead have found us first. Let us show them the quality of Dwarfen Gromril!
Sigmar's blood! The Dwarfs are waylaid. Defend yourselves!
Defeat Arkhan himself!
Time to cut these monsters down to size!
More monsters heed their Ghoul King's call!
The Beastmen have brought a Cygor to the battle! Kill that monster with haste!
The king is defeated!
Move your army to defend the approach to Yuatek.
Move your army to defend the approach to Hexoatl.
Move your army to defend the approach to Naggarond.
Move your army to defend the approach to Lothern.
These wolves are cunning! The Ulricans' hidden reinforcements have revealed themselves!
The Lizardmen make their way onto the Isle! Defeat them!
Lured by the smell of blood, even more Trolls join the fight.
Clear the Troll Country of monstrous foes.
Drawn by the sounds of battle, more Trolls have arrived.
A sudden chill overwhelms you. Your men can barely feel their extremities, with the intense cold making any movement difficult.

column1: Slay Frigustrex before your army collapses in the blizzard!
column2: true
Amongst this Beastmen herd are the two giant Cygor brothers – the Soul-Eaters – one of which has already taken to the field. Slay them both for a great sacrifice!
Traygard Mountain-Cleaver has been spotted up ahead. Slay him for a great sacrifice!
Ahead of you are the giant spiders of the swarm known as The Brood Queens of Karak Azul.

column1: Kill them all for a great sacrifice!
column2: true
The air in this cave is thick with the smell of foul monsters.

column1: Slay Blorgar the Mad Titan and any other filthy creatures that dwell here!
column2: true
The elusive Radixashen, Serpent of the Worldroots, has revealed itself! Slay it in front of its beloved Oak of Ages!
The hunt is on! But wait… are those mammoth calves?
The Abyssal Shrieker is invulnerable and can endlessly summon more minions.

column1: There must be a way to kill it, however!
column2: true
Kill the guardians and extinguish the Mother's flame!
Kill the Carnosaur!
Those fools are not aware of the doom that creeps upon them. Wait until the critical moment, then slaughter them all!
An Ancient Treeman has joined the fray and is using its powers to protect its beloved Forest Dragon.

column1: Bring the Treeman down before the Dragon can destroy you!
column2: true
The Merwyrm's spawn swarm the battlefield!
Defend the pass, let not a single Goblin through to our lands beyond!
Success! The sorcerer is defeated! We must now seize the initiative and wipe out the remaining forces!
Slaughter the cattle!
Deploy your rat ogres in the forest.
Deploy your cavalry in the forest.
Frigustrex has fallen! What a glorious offering!
One of the Soul-Eaters has fallen! Slay his brother to complete the hunt!
Traygard has fallen! What a glorious offering!
The Brood Queens have fallen! What a glorious offering!
Blorgar has fallen! What a glorious offering!
Radixashen has fallen! What a glorious offering!
The Dwarfs have been defeated!
The Abyssal Shrieker has fallen! What a glorious offering!
The flame is extinguished. The world will fall in darkness… as you desire…
The behemoth falls!
Your allies have been out-flanked by the Greenskin horde, help them before they are destroyed.

Ha, these mercenaries are cowards! They use handguns and cannons to fell our brave Knights rather than risk ignominious death in honest, noble melee. Show them true Bretonnian steel – charge them down before our numbers dwindle too much!
The thief thinks herself safe on that rock. Show her how wrong she is!
Crush the enemy vanguard before they are reinforced from the shrine.
This sorcerer summons Chaos forces to his will. Destroy him before they become too powerful.
The Waaagh! may have come to the Broken Leg Gully, but this place will be their tomb!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the High Elves led by Tyrion!
A final foray of beasts rise from the south, we must fight back-to-back!
More beasts descend from the north, defend the ridgeline!
Defend against the ambush!
Bretonnia flanked the warherd with Pegasus Knights!
Fellheart himself approaches!
Beard-things think fire can stop Queek? Kill-kills them I will!
The Serpent's puppet has his master’s favour! Attacking him is futile, at least for now...
The sorcerer will continue summoning more reinforcements as long as he lives. We must destroy him or be overwhelmed.
Cleanse the hill of all Unliving creatures!
Survey your army and choose a formation, then advance.
The enemy Lord approaches…
Greenskins are nearing the tomb, time to close our trap!
Defeat the Lizardmen
Survey your army and choose a formation, then advance.
Their Lord is down! The political landscape has shifted. The Reiksguard can commit without endangering the Emperor's position!
Annihilate all the Greenskins in these mountains!
The Vampires have sent their creatures to flank us from the air. Stop them!
Select your Lord.
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Survive the Dark Elves' invasion!
Take control of your nearby units and press the attack.
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the Beastmen hordes!
A horde of zombies is advancing on us!
These repellent beasts abhor the Geld-Prince. Wipe them out!
A small force of Goblins has flanked us!
The Orcish raiders have decided to meet our challenge rather than scurrying away! Show them the folly of crossing blades with the bravest of Bretonnia!
A gleeful cackle can be heard echoing through the woods. Be on your guard!
The Night Goblins waited patiently while we slaughtered their bigger cousins. Now they sniff an opportunity to take the spoils for themselves!
Khalida's legion awaits your command. Call in their artillery support now.
End the turn.
Graktar joins the battle. Wounded by the venom, he's nothing but a desperate old Gor. Take his horn!
More of Graktar's followers join the battle!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Defeat the High Elves led by Teclis!
Activate a unit ability.
More of the Lizard-things arrive, kill-kill them all!
The Chaos forces keep on coming - clearly the Blood God is hungry!
Slay these bulls, let the rest know who is the true master!
Send these man-filth Knights to the halls of the Dark Gods!
The Eagle’s puppet has his master’s favour! Attacking him is futile, at least for now...
More Asur emerge from the city. Lay waste to them!
The Warrior-Queen joins the battle – beware her elite archer legions!
[[img:UI/Battle UI/ADC_icons/warhammer2/icon_capture_point.png]][[/img]]Survive the Dark Elves' invasion!
Arrange your troops in a line for battle.
Defend the ridge.
Establish a defensive position on the ridge.
A further tide of disgusting Greenskins have arrived - look to the flanks!
More of the vermin approach! Slaughter them!
The Great Bat has woken those that dwell within the caverns!
The Great Bat draws closer - it will soon be upon us!
The creature descends from above! I will slay it myself!
Defeat the Grey Seer Clan defence
Here come those bouncing, explodin' Squigs - shoot 'em from afar, we're in trouble if they catch up wiv us!
Click the Details button to switch to the Details tab.
The Black Ark has unleashed more monsters!
The Horned Rat is coming, defeat the Grey Seer Clan!
Slaughter dose humies! Rush through their forces and destroy 'em!
Those nasty little stunties hate a surprise - ambush and kill 'em, da gitz!
Right boyz, this is not a new concept. We need to kill those stunted little gitz with 'extreem prej-oo-dis'!
Filthy Greenskins have polluted the vault of the Ancestors! Cleanse it of their stench!
The crypt doors have swung open and more Undead pour forth!
Kill his forces and the Dragon Lord shall surely appear.
Morathi and a Beastmen Warherd have joined forces. Fight through the Beastmen charge and sweep her forces from the field.
Destroy the Asur before they are reinforced from the city.
